message.content:
cs.NA, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.AR, cs.SE 

This paper discusses a method for detecting and correcting errors in iterative solvers, which is a topic related to numerical analysis (cs.NA). The use of algorithm-based fault tolerance (ABFT) is also a key aspect of the paper, which falls under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also proposes a performance model for evaluating the different approaches, which is related to data structures and algorithms (cs.DS). Additionally, the paper discusses the implementation of the method in the preconditioned conjugate gradient algorithm, which is a topic related to computer architecture (cs.AR). Finally, the paper presents simulations to validate the approach, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
